com.jgefroh.core
Interface ICore

All Known Implementing Classes:
Core
public interface ICore

The interface for the Core.

Core is the heart of the game.

Core keeps track of all Entities, InfoPacks, InfoPackFactories, and Systems.

It monitors Entities for changes in their composition of Components, and automatically generates appropriate InfoPacks.

It calls methods that perform work in Systems. It also provides accessor methods so that Systems can retrieve the InfoPacks that are relevant to them.

Since:
20MAY13
Version:
0.1.0
Author:
Joseph Gefroh
See Also:
IEntity, IInfoPack, IInfoPackFactory, ISystem, IEntity

Method Detail

addEntity

void addEntity(IEntity entity)
Starts tracking the passed Entity. This should also generate the InfoPacks for the Entity.

Parameters:
entity - the Entity to begin tracking

addInfoPack

void addInfoPack(IEntity entity,
                 IInfoPack infoPack)
Starts tracking the passed InfoPack.

Parameters:
entity - the Entity whose components the InfoPack is grouping
infoPack - the InfoPack to start tracking

addFactory

void addFactory(IInfoPackFactory factory)
Starts using the passed InfoPackFactory to generate infoPacks.

Parameters:
factory - the InfoPackFactory that generates InfoPacks

addSystem

void addSystem(ISystem system,
               int priority)
Starts tracking the passed System. This should ensure that the System is started.

Parameters:
system - the System to begin tracking
priority - the order in which the System should be executed

removeEntity

void removeEntity(IEntity entity)
Stops tracking the passed Entity. This should ensure that the associated InfoPacks are removed.

Parameters:
entity - the Entity to stop tracking

removeInfoPack

void removeInfoPack(IInfoPack infoPack)
Stops tracking the passed InfoPack.

Parameters:
infoPack - the InfoPack to stop tracking

removeSystem

void removeSystem(ISystem system)
Stops tracking the passed System. This should ensure that the System is stopped.

Parameters:
system - the System to stop tracking

getInfoPacksOfType

<T extends IInfoPack> java.util.ArrayList<T> getInfoPacksOfType(java.lang.Class<T> t)
Gets InfoPacks of a specific Class type.

Parameters:
t - the Class type of the InfoPacks to retrieve
Returns:
an ArrayList with only the InfoPacks of the passed type

getInfoPackFrom

<T extends IInfoPack> T getInfoPackFrom(IEntity entity,
                                        java.lang.Class<T> type)
Gets a specific InfoPack from the passed Entity.

Parameters:
entity - the Entity associated with the desired InfoPack
type - the Class type of the InfoPack to retrieve
Returns:
the InfoPack of the passed type; returns null if it does not exist

getSystem

<T extends ISystem> T getSystem(java.lang.Class<T> t)
Gets a System that is being tracked by Core.

Parameters:
t - the Class type of the System whose reference to return
Returns:
the System of the desired type returns null if it does not exist

work

void work()
Performs the work in all of the Systems tracked by Core. This should ensure that InfoPacks are valid and generated.

generateInfoPacks

void generateInfoPacks(IEntity entity)
Generates all of the appropriate InfoPacks for the given Entity.

Parameters:
entity - the Entity for whom the InfoPacks are being generated
